name: CSV User Import with custom email message
author: N4thaniel (inspired from Andy Dunn import csv plugin)

sections.description:
Import users from a csv files and send a custom message using specific shortcodes.

You can choose capabilities for new users.

(original import csv script from AndyDunn)
sections.installation:
1. Upload import-users-csv.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. You will see a new ‘Import CSV’ option under the existing ‘Users’ menu area.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • First release of plugin. No changes. tested with 3.7.1 – all ok

1.0.0

  • First release of plugin. No changes.

short_description: Allows you to import a list and create users from a CSV files . Allows you to send a custom email with credentials
